info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 3:25AM EST until January 14 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Storm total snow accumulations 6 to 12 inches in most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Near blizzard conditions at times this morning. * WHERE...Niagara and Orleans counties. Greatest snow amounts in southern Niagara and southwest Orleans counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult with snow covered roads. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility to near zero in lake effect bands.
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
